title: Create MSBuild Nuget packages targetting multiple platforms
body:
The [current](https://dotnet.myget.org/feed/dotnet-buildtools/package/nuget/Microsoft.Build) MSBuild nuget packages only target .net core. We should come up with a packaging strategy that targets .net core, net46, and mono.

The .net core binaries are built on xplat. net46 binaries are built on master. Mono binaries could be built on either.
